numbered_ace_sentences: 3. A person can apply to a college.
4. A college can admit a person.
5. It seems that if a person is richer then the chance that the person gets into a college is higher.
6. A person can be a legacy applicant.
7. Legacy status has a positive effect on an admission decision.
9. This bias is legal in our country.
10. This bias is not regulated in our country.
11. I will go into college next year.
12. This year I have applied to colleges.
13. This situation has a big impact on me.
14. This situation has a big impact on everyone else in my grade.
15. A headline is: Rich equals admitted.
16. A graph shows the likelihood of getting into college based on economic status.
17. A headline is: The dark side of college admissions.
